events.message: I would like to request a refund because the product I received was not what I ordered and I am very disappointed.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to customer dissatisfaction with the product received.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request submitted by the customer.
Hello! Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number for verification?
In order to process your refund quickly, could you share details such as the order number and the reason for the refund?
My order number is 4587123. The item was completely different from what I ordered and I want my money back as soon as possible.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund and provide you with a prepaid return label to send the item back at no cost.
Thank you for the prompt response. I appreciate the prepaid return label and look forward to receiving my refund soon.
Your refund has been processed successfully and the return label has been emailed to you. Please ship the item back at your earliest convenience.
We are following up to confirm that you have received the return label and inquire if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I received the return label and have already sent the package back. Thanks for your help!
Since your refund was processed and the return completed, we are now closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent a customer satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on the support experience.
